name: Aditya Sagar

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

experience.title: React Native Developer (Volunteer)
responsibilities: Contributed to a mobile app focused on preserving and teaching African indigenous languages.
Building UI components and integrating APIs using React Native.
Collaborating with a small remote team to iterate on app design and features.

experience.title: React Native Developer (Volunteer)
responsibilities: Contributed to a mobile app focused on providing plumbing services in St. John’s NL.
Building Searchbar, fixing navigation errors and integrating APIs using React Native.
Collaborating with a small remote team to iterate on app design and features.

experience.title: Frontend Developer (Volunteer)
responsibilities: Helped develop HTML5-based mini games that generate ad revenue donated to charities.
Worked with designers and backend developers to build responsive, accessible game UIs.
Learned Agile collaboration and feedback workflows on a remote team.

experience.title: Food Drive Volunteer
responsibilities: Assisted in collecting and distributing non-perishable food items in the Sherwood community.
Supported event setup, door-to-door collection, and local food donation logistics.

projects.name: Discover Charlottetown
description: Solo-built a web app highlighting events, dining, and attractions in Charlottetown, PEI.
Integrated MapLibre for interactive maps where users mark visited locations.
150+ commits; backend deployed on Fly.io with CI/CD; frontend hosted on Netlify.

projects.name: Real-time Social Media Platform
description: Built a full-stack social media app with messaging, notifications, comments, and likes.
Used Socket.io for real-time features and MongoDB aggregations for performance.
Resolved backend data loss via improved query handling and async management.

summary: Full-stack developer and Unity-certified game programmer with experience in React, Node.js, and TypeScript. Built full-stack apps with real-time features and interactive maps. Developed 2D/3D games in Unity and Unreal with AI, procedural systems, and polished gameplay. Passionate about building engaging, well-engineered apps and games that deliver real value.
heading_line: I craft high-impact apps and immersive games—full-stack by skill, game dev by heart, driven to build experiences that feel as good as they work.
